title: VIDEO: Soccer Player Hilariously Thanks Wife AND Girlfriend When Receiving Award
text:
McDonald’s Worker Sees Cop in Trouble in Drive-Thru, Jumps Out Window To Help 
“I’m so sorry, my wife!” he quickly added after realizing his error. “I love you so much from my heart. Thanks for supporting me, there is more to come.” 
According to the U.K. Daily Mirror , the happily married Anas has claimed the whole thing was one big misunderstanding, that he has not been cheating on his wife, and that the “girlfriend” he thanked for her support was actually his young daughter. 
“I’m famous now. People around the world know me,” he said in attempting to explain away his gaffe. “My family knows that I call my daughter my girlfriend. That’s what I was talking about. I don’t have a girlfriend.”   
As for his wife of seven years, Anas believed she understood what he had meant and wasn’t worried about her being upset with him, stating, “I love her so much. She’s given me two beautiful children. She is fine. She knows what kind of man I am so I am not worried.”
